title.romaji: Shi Zhi Ge - Hua Yu Yan De Kuangxiang Shi
title.native: 时之歌—花与焰的狂想诗

description:
The story takes place on Verhaeren, a planet in the Milky Way.

One day, a mysterious man in black arrived on the planet to stir up chaos. However, he realizes that he got the time and place wrong. Despite it all, the threatening atmosphere is still present and Hsuan Dodge decides to unite all the elites from the 4 kingdoms in order to maintain peace.
